languages.text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к потрясающе сложному, построенному по непостижимо древним чертежам механизму, завораживает. Каждая система этой машины служит двум целям — хранить жизнь в хрупкой плоти Паскаля и предупредить угрозу любого рода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к потрясающе сложному, построенному по непостижимо древним чертежам механизму, завораживает. Каждая система этой машины служит одной цели — хранить жизнь в хрупкой плоти Паскаля и предупредить угрозу любого рода.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к потрясающе сложному, построенному по непостижимо древним чертежам механизму, завораживает. Каждая система этой машины служит двум целям — хранить жизнь в хрупкой плоти Паскаля и предупредить угрозу любого рода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an attachment to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerizing. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of keeping life in Pascal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an attachment to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerizing. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of keeping life in Pascal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerizing. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pascal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerizing. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pascal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看到肉体变成了某种古老的机械，这不禁让你心醉神迷。眼前的这台机器复杂得令人难以置信，是根据某种高深莫测的古老蓝图制造出来的。这台机器上的每个零件都有两个目的，一是保存帕斯卡脆弱肉体中的生命，二是保护他的人身安全免受一切外界威胁影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看到肉体变成了某种古老的机械，这不禁让你心醉神迷。眼前的这台机器复杂得令人难以置信，是根据某种高深莫测的古老蓝图制造出来的。这台机器上的每个零件都有两个目的，一是保存帕斯卡脆弱肉体中的生命，二是保护他的人身安全免受一切外界威胁影响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ver la transformación de un cuerpo en el apéndice de un mecanismo increíblemente complejo mediante planos de una antigüedad incomprensible es algo hipnótico. Cada componente de esta máquina sirve dos propósitos: preservar la vida en la frágil carne de Pasqal y evitar toda amenaza a su bienestar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ver la transformación de un cuerpo en el apéndice de un mecanismo increíblemente complejo mediante planos de una antigüedad incomprensible es algo hipnótico. Cada componente de esta máquina sirve dos propósitos: preservar la vida en la frágil carne de Pasqal y evitar toda amenaza a su bienestar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}底知れぬ古代の設計図を使って作られた、とてつもなく複雑な機構の付属物と化した肉体の姿には魅了されるようだった。この機械のすべての部品は、パスカルの脆弱な肉体の生命を維持し、彼の幸福を脅かすあらゆる脅威を防ぐという2つの目的を果たすのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}底知れぬ古代の設計図を使って作られた、とてつもなく複雑な機構の付属物と化した肉体の姿には魅了されるようだった。この機械のすべての部品は、パスカルの脆弱な肉体の生命を維持し、彼の幸福を脅かすあらゆる脅威を防ぐという2つの目的を果たすのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist ein faszinierender Anblick: Ein Körper, der zu einem Anhängsel einer unglaublich komplexen Maschine umgewandelt wurde, einer Maschine auf Basis unvorstellbar alter Baupläne. Jedes Bauteil dieser Maschine dient dem doppelten Zweck, in Pasqals fragilem Fleisch das Leben zu bewahren und alle Gefahren für sein Wohlergehen zu verhindern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist ein faszinierender Anblick: Ein Körper, der zu einem Anhängsel einer unglaublich komplexen Maschine umgewandelt wurde, einer Maschine auf Basis unvorstellbar alter Baupläne. Jedes Bauteil dieser Maschine dient dem doppelten Zweck, in Pasqals fragilem Fleisch das Leben zu bewahren und alle Gefahren für sein Wohlergehen zu verhindern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|fasciné|fascinée} par la vue de ce corps transformé en appendice d'un mécanisme incroyablement complexe, construit à partir de plans aussi anciens que mystérieux. Chaque composant sert à la fois à préserver la vie de la fragile chair de Pasqal et à empêcher toute menace à son encontre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|fasciné|fascinée} par la vue de ce corps transformé en appendice d'un mécanisme incroyablement complexe, construit à partir de plans aussi anciens que mystérieux. Chaque composant sert à la fois à préserver la vie de la fragile chair de Pasqal et à empêcher toute menace à son encontre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Akıl sır almayacak derecede kadim taslaklar kullanılarak inşa edilen, ekstra organlarca dönüştürülmüş bu inanılmaz kompleks mekanizma, büyüleyici bir görüntüye sahip. Makinedeki her bir bileşen, iki amaca birden hizmet ediyor. Bunlar, Pasqal'ın kırılgan bedeninin yaşamını korumak ve ona yönelik her türlü tehdidi engellemek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to an incredibly complex mechanism built using unfathomably ancient blueprints is mesmerising. Every component of this machine serves the dual purpose of preserving life in Pasqal's fragile flesh and preventing all threats to his well-being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Akıl sır almayacak derecede kadim taslaklar kullanılarak inşa edilen, ekstra organlarca dönüştürülmüş bu inanılmaz kompleks mekanizma, büyüleyici bir görüntüye sahip. Makinedeki her bir bileşen iki amaca da hizmet ediyor: Pasqal'ın kırılgan bedeninin yaşamını korumak ve ona yönelik her türlü tehdidi engellemek.{/n}
